description: This file defines multiple agent configurations for an AI system, including their models, tools, storage, and instructions. It imports various modules and sets up agents with specific roles and capabilities.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, tools, and storage configurations.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles the memory component for agents, including model and database.

classes.name: PostgresMemoryDb
classes.description: PostgreSQL database interface for storing memories.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: OpenAI chat model used for conversational agents.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Anthropic Claude model used for specific agents.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: SQLite storage backend for agent data.

classes.name: DalleTools
classes.description: Tools for generating images with DALL-E.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: Tools for research and data analysis.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Tools for reasoning and instruction handling.

classes.name: YouTubeTools
classes.description: Tools for interacting with YouTube videos.
